UK police to counter hostile state threats with new unitBritish police said on Friday they had set up a new unit to counter threats posed by China, Russia and Iran, saying they were very concerned about risks ahead of a national election expected this year. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:49:46 GMT E5I7OWI4LJJJPJ57QVQ65OYBYE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-police-counter-hostile-state-threats-with-new-unit-2024-01-19/Michael Holden世界英国
Brazil backs Beijing's 'One China policy,' foreign minister Wang Yi saysChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday welcomed Brazil's recent support for Beijing's "One China policy" that states Taiwan is an inseparable part of China, in a sign of stronger bilateral ties with South America's largest country. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:11:39 GMT FZCLBNVUOVPHNF274TRANIQSS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/brazil-backs-beijings-one-china-policy-foreign-minister-wang-yi-says-2024-01-19/Anthony Boadle世界
Heard in Davos: What we learned from the WEF in 2024World leaders and business executives left the freezing temperatures of the Swiss mountain resort of Davos after a week of high-stakes meetings about key world issues. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 16:55:51 GMT NEX43VBAW5IJ5JHVJX6VYG4M3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/heard-davos-what-we-learned-wef-2024-2024-01-19/Reuters商业达沃斯
ICBC to pay $32.4 mln to US regulators over AML lapses, supervisory information disclosureThe Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd and its New York branch will pay $32.4 million in penalties for the unauthorized use and disclosure of confidential supervisory information, the Federal Reserve announced Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 16:12:52 GMT 3IJTVPO7FFKEDMQ5HGHTM5PXZA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/icbc-pay-324-mln-us-regulators-over-aml-lapses-supervisory-information-2024-01-19/Reuters商业金融
USDA confirms first big US soy sale to China since mid-DecemberThe U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) on Friday confirmed private sales of 297,000 metric tons of U.S. soybeans to China, the first soybean sales announcement under its daily reporting rules since Dec. 19 and the first to the world's top buyer of the oilseed since Dec. 15. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 15:49:51 GMT 5MMK6TNH7JMPHNFIBQTHHGTLMM https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/usda-confirms-first-big-us-soy-sale-china-since-mid-december-2024-01-19/Reuters市场商品
EU to propose all members scrutinise investmentsThe European Commission will propose next week a law requiring all EU countries to scrutinise foreign investments to determine whether they pose a security risk, as part of the bloc's efforts to boost its economic security, a document seen by Reuters showed. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 15:37:25 GMT CKZ6KBCNVRM5RGL2EAXKJLO3HI https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/eu-propose-extending-investment-screening-all-eu-countries-2024-01-19/Philip Blenkinsop市场欧洲市场
